title: Make it so we can see Yasuo's E cooldown on the minion like he sees it
body: I feel like this wouldn't nerf him that much but will make him less frustrating to play against in lane since you would know which minions to stay away from rather than just missing staying as far away from it as possible. Good idea or not?

replies.body: It'd be nice, but it's also A LOT of visual clutter.
Basically this, OP. It's a lot of potential visual noise when the Yasuo player can light up the entire minion wave with a particle effect.

> [{quoted}](name=NightFang82,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qt8VEU4Z,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-22T19:07:19.165+0000)

> I feel like this wouldn&#039;t nerf him that much but will make him less frustrating to play against in lane since you would know which minions to stay away from rather than just missing staying as far away from it as possible. Good idea or not?

It would be a significant nerf to him for the precise reason that you want this nerf.  Also, there is visual clutter like Angus said.

I don't want this, even if I am always the one playing against the Yasuo.
